# Homework6

The goal of Homework6 is to create a package that allows for basic
operations on sparse matrices. Contains several methods relating to the
development of sparse matrices, including arithmetic operations,
statistical operations, and display operations.

## Installation

You can install the development version of Homework6 in github like so:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("akash-rajeev/Homework6)
```

## Example

Here are some basic examples relating to the package

``` r
library(Homework6)

# Create a regular numeric vector
regular_vec = c(0, 1.5, 0, 0, 2.3, 0, 0, 4.1, 0, 0)

# Convert to sparse format
sparse_vec = as(regular_vec, "sparse_numeric")
print(sparse_vec)
#> Sparse Numeric Vector (length = 10 )
#> Non-zero values:
#>   position value
#> 1        2   1.5
#> 2        5   2.3
#> 3        8   4.1

# Create another sparse vector
regular_vec2 = c(0, 0.5, 0, 1.0, 2.3, 0, 0, 0, 3.2, 0)
sparse_vec2 = as(regular_vec2, "sparse_numeric")

# Arithmetic operations
sum_vec = sparse_vec + sparse_vec2
print(sum_vec)
#> Sparse Numeric Vector (length = 10 )
#> Non-zero values:
#>   position value
#> 1        2   2.0
#> 2        4   1.0
#> 3        5   4.6
#> 4        8   4.1
#> 5        9   3.2
diff_vec = sparse_vec - sparse_vec2
print(diff_vec)
#> Sparse Numeric Vector (length = 10 )
#> Non-zero values:
#>   position value
#> 1        2   1.0
#> 2        4  -1.0
#> 3        8   4.1
#> 4        9  -3.2
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`coerce-numeric-sparse_numeric`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/coerce-numeric-sparse_numeric.md)
  : Convert Numeric Vector to Sparse Numeric Vector
- [`coerce-sparse_numeric-numeric`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/coerce-sparse_numeric-numeric.md)
  : Convert Sparse Numeric Vector to Numeric Vector
- [`mean()`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/mean.md)
  : Mean of Sparse Numeric Vector
- [`norm()`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/norm.md)
  : Norm of Sparse Numeric Vector
- [`plot(`*`<sparse_numeric>`*`,`*`<sparse_numeric>`*`)`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/plot-sparse_numeric-sparse_numeric-method.md)
  : Plot Method for Comparing Two Sparse Numeric Vectors
- [`show(`*`<sparse_numeric>`*`)`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/show-sparse_numeric-method.md)
  : Show Method for Sparse Numeric Vectors
- [`sparse_add()`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/sparse_add.md)
  [`` `+`( ``*`<sparse_numeric>`*`,`*`<sparse_numeric>`*`)`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/sparse_add.md)
  : Add Two Sparse Numeric Vectors
- [`sparse_crossprod()`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/sparse_crossprod.md)
  : Dot Product/Cross Product (?) of Sparse Numeric Vectors
- [`sparse_mult()`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/sparse_mult.md)
  [`` `*`( ``*`<sparse_numeric>`*`,`*`<sparse_numeric>`*`)`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/sparse_mult.md)
  : Multiply Two Sparse Numeric Vectors
- [`sparse_numeric-class`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/sparse_numeric-class.md)
  : Sparse Numeric Vector Class
- [`sparse_sub()`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/sparse_sub.md)
  [`` `-`( ``*`<sparse_numeric>`*`,`*`<sparse_numeric>`*`)`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/sparse_sub.md)
  : Subtract Two Sparse Numeric Vectors
- [`standardize()`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/standardize.md)
  : Standardize Sparse Numeric Vector
- [`sum(`*`<sparse_numeric>`*`)`](https://akash-rajeev.github.io/Homework6/reference/sum-sparse_numeric-method.md)
  : Sum of Sparse Numeric Vector
